data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "ClassPass partner account setup". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

requestBody.title: Configure default pricing rules API Trace

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: ""Book Now" button on Facebook page". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
